marklogic.body: I Always love latest update from Bush Has BEENS. John Bolton is a huge example of a discredited foreign policy guy. And since you guys know Obama is a Muslim, commie, Stalinist, marxist why in the world would it be news to you that he doesn't support Israel. WOW. I think Sheriff Joe should now put his possee on getting Barry for treason for leaking intelligence. It didn't work with W and Cheney, but what the heck, he's a Muslim. So go get Sheriff JOe. Tell him to quit wating for the LSM to make him feel warm and cozzy with his forgery case. He's got bigger fish to fry. You guys are totally amazing. War, War, War. and for good measure we are going to re-invent the Cold War. Way to go REPS. Presidetn Obama's re-election gets more certain every day.
